query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Horse Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Freedom and Vitality - The Sacred Guardian of the Horse',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Horse symbolizes freedom, vitality, and unstoppable momentum. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Horse embodies the spirit of adventure and the courage to pursue one''s dreams without restraint. Those born in the Year of the Horse are blessed with boundless energy and an infectious enthusiasm for life.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Horse (1954, 1966, 1978, 1990, 2002, 2014, 2026)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Horse''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510007;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Goat Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Creativity and Gentleness - The Sacred Guardian of the Goat',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Goat symbolizes creativity, gentleness, and artistic sensitivity. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Goat represents harmony, compassion, and the ability to find beauty in all things. Those born under this sign possess a gentle soul and natural artistic talents that bring joy to others.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Goat (1955, 1967, 1979, 1991, 2003, 2015, 2027)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Goat''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510008;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Monkey Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Cleverness and Versatility - The Sacred Guardian of the Monkey',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Monkey symbolizes cleverness, versatility, and playful wisdom. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Monkey symbolizes intelligence, adaptability, and the ability to find creative solutions to any challenge. Those born in the Year of the Monkey are blessed with quick wit and the gift of bringing laughter and lightness to serious situations.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Monkey (1956, 1968, 1980, 1992, 2004, 2016, 2028)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Monkey''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510009;
